Question: Perovskia Solar AG CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Perovskia Solar AG

Product: Perovskia Solar AG CES 2024

- Switzerland-based startup specializing in perovskite-based solar cell technology
- Technology allows solar cells to be printed directly onto glass for indoor devices
- Linear production curve for indoor use, maintaining efficiency
- Cells can be printed onto glass substrate and wired into devices for power
- Working on technology to directly print cells onto printed circuit boards
- Latest generation cells have open-circuit voltage of 0.9V and power output of 80 µw/cm² – 85 µw/cm² under indoor lighting at 1,000 lux
- Aiming to increase power output to 100 µw/cm² – 120 µw/cm²
- Efficiency of 80% maintained after 5,000 hours of full sun exposure
- Cells comply with Restriction of Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment (RoHS) standards

Perovskia Solar AG（佩罗夫斯基太阳能）

产品：Perovskia Solar AG CES 2024

-总部位于瑞士的初创企业，专注于钙钛矿太阳能电池技术
-技术可以直接将太阳能电池印刷在玻璃上，用于室内设备
-室内使用保持效率的线性生产曲线
-电池可以印刷在玻璃衬底上，并与设备进行电源连接
-正在研发将电池直接印刷在印刷电路板上的技术
-最新一代电池在1000勒克斯的室内照明下，开路电压为0.9V，功率输出为80µw/ cm² - 85µw/ cm²
-目标是将功率输出提高至100µw/ cm² - 120µw/ cm²
-在经过5000小时的全日照暴露后，保持80%的效率
-电池符合电气和电子设备中有害物质限制(RoHS) 标准
